trans-unit.target: How should I address you, Commander?
Are you sure you want to cancel this job? This cannot be undone. Hit continue and half of any resources spent will be returned. NO ITEMS SPENT WILL BE RETURNED.
This player is currently online. Attacking an online player will consume an extra Warp Gate.
Sorry, that job has already completed. You can no longer cancel it.
This player is in your alliance so you can't attack them.
This player is currently online and you must be at least level 10 to attack an online player.
You are currently under base protection. If you attack a player your protection will be lost
You are building a turret! It will not fire until it's finished. You may want to speed it up to improve your defenses!
